title: Rate fuel consumed: multiple representations part - c

content.description: The rate of fuel consumption, in gallons per minute, recorded during an airplane flight is given by a twice-differentiable and strictly increasing function R of time t. The graph of R and a table of selected values of R(t), for the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 90 minutes, are shown above.
content.question: Approximate the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mrow> <mn>90</mn></mrow> </msubsup> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aapedapaqaa8qacaWGsbaal8aabaWdbiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaaiMda caaIWaaaniabgUIiYdGcdaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiaadsgacaWG0baaaa@433F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> using a left Riemann sum with the five subintervals indicated by the data in the table. Is this numerical approximation less than the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mrow> <mn>90</mn></mrow> </msubsup> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aapedapaqaa8qacaWGsbaal8aabaWdbiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaaiMda caaIWaaaniabgUIiYdGcdaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiaadsgacaWG0baaaa@433F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>? Explain your reasoning.

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
